body:
roots/roots.h (strong mutable immovable roots) entry for no_undetectable_objects_protector:
V(PropertyCell, no_undetectable_objects_protector,                           
    NoUndetectableObjectsProtector)

heap/setup-heap-internal.cc: In CreateInitialMutableObjects(), protector is set via factory->NewProtector():
set_no_undetectable_objects_protector(*factory->NewProtector());

This shows the root's accessor and that the factory provides NewProtector to create the PropertyCell used as the protector cell.
explanation: Identifies where the protector root is declared and where the heap sets up the protector cell, via Factory::NewProtector(). This anchor is important for DependencyAttachment to the protector cell.
